body: @Osmose agreed re: brittleness. I figured we would just add flexibility/handle different types of schemas as they came in, but right now it's definitely a hybrid of trying to be flexible but hard-coding individual action forms anyway soooo I'm not opposed to doing a full-blown hard-code.  It will remove of a lot of the helper code. If I had added specific form-config files for each action, I'd say let's try for a generic/flexible approach. I will push a hard-coded implementation today and we can see how that looks.
